PalindromicalPCE¶

public class PalindromicalPCE¶

Created by jeremy on 6/22/16.

Methods¶

computePalindromicERO¶

public Map<String, List<TopoEdge>> computePalindromicERO(RequestedVlanPipeE requestPipe, List<ReservedBandwidthE> rsvBwList, List<ReservedVlanE> rsvVlanList)¶

Depends on DijkstraPCE to construct the Physical-Layer EROs for a request

Parameters:
  • requestPipe – Requested pipe with required reservation parameters
Throws:
  • PCEException –
Returns:

A two-element Map containing both the forward-direction (A->Z) ERO and the reverse-direction (Z->A) ERO
